lines.text: I am incapable of destroying your home and making unhappy another woman that loves you.
But whom I don't love. Because I love you.
That you think now, because you think of our son. But in depth, the one you love is she. If it had been her the one that gave you a son...
But she hasn't given me one. You're the one who has more rights. That's why I'm going to get divorced.
I have come to thank you for giving me Carlitos back.
Carlitos! Have you said... Carlitos! Then, who is...
Doesn't his name tell you anything?
So hasn't your heart told you when you were operating him?
Yes! Now I understand what I felt upon seeing him hurt.
